topic.title: Discharge Medications Section (entries required) (V3) - conformance rules

section.p: This section contains the medications the patient is intended to take or stop after discharge. Current, active medications must be listed. The section may also include a patient's prescription history and indicate the source of the medication list.

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:1198-7822, CONF:1198-10397, CONF:1198-32562 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.11.1"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @extension="2015-08-01"
SHALL conform to Discharge Medications Section Entries Optional2 template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.11:2015-08-01)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] @nullFlavor="NI" (CONF:1198-32812)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:1198-15361)/@code="10183-2" Hospital Discharge Medications (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:1198-15362, CONF:1198-32145)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title (CONF:1198-7824)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] text (CONF:1198-7825)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..*] entry such that it (CONF:1198-7826, CONF:1198-15491, DSTU:820)
If section/@nullFlavor is not present:
Conforms to Discharge Medication2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.35:2016-03-01)
SHALL conform to Hospital Discharge Medications Section Entries Optional template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.11)
SHALL conform to Discharge Medications Section Entries Optional2 template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.11:2015-08-01)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] @nullFlavor="NI" (CONF:1198-32812)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:1198-15361)/@code="10183-2" Hospital Discharge Medications (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:1198-15362, CONF:1198-32145)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title (CONF:1198-7824)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] text (CONF:1198-7825)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHOULD contain [0..*] entry such that it (CONF:1198-7820, CONF:1198-15490)
Conforms to Discharge Medication2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.35:2016-03-01)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..*] entry such that it (CONF:1198-7826, CONF:1198-15491, DSTU:820)
Conforms to Discharge Medication2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.35:2016-03-01)
If section/@nullFlavor is not present:

body.codeblock: <section xmlns="urn:hl7-org:v3" nullFlavor="NI"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.11.1" extension="2015-08-01"/> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.11"/> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.11" extension="2015-08-01"/> <code code="10183-2" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.1" codeSystemName="LOINC" displayName="HOSPITAL DISCHARGE MEDICATIONS"/> <title>HOSPITAL DISCHARGE MEDICATIONS</title> <text>xPwLQtNDP UhdJmdAuH sTyxdv SXbMfzx sAsrSXBr AuxAAAgj mffUe yvsBnjOD VtUhrQYym ffCSCOGOo LhVRIafZ wiHqLanW ZXqkzGocd DagOaS YHizXuntO CeIFfb AjIkzAv QYRGWc YwKpzHXE jTOHwvoS fgPGL KyNwbEFLp jnYESP jddnTeF SXuwypqC aDfMdEJ FXHrwTasb MdUsCtBtS zfXNk fqawAzS sULVcVXD knkFxwtY EcUcVokDJ zFMHVjxk HQHvn dyUeB SFkekEb jHGyeou wvKSHg EyXby MBUUOgx vgadeSX wJGhE jHiOyeT qOATnNEPo uqCnXsWjT UgTtReYiN WKlXdCw odnMRBz </text> </section>

ol.li: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:10397 ) such that it SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.11.1"
SHALL conform to Hospital Discharge Medications Section Entries Optional template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.11)

Consol Hospital Discharge Medications Section If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..*] entry such that it (CONF:7827) Conforms to Discharge Medication (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.35)
Consol Hospital Discharge Medications Section SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:15361)/@code="10183-2" HOSPITAL DISCHARGE MEDICATIONS (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:15362)
Consol Hospital Discharge Medications Section SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] text (CONF:7825)
Consol Hospital Discharge Medications Section SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title (CONF:7824)
